# DxTBjointCE

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of DxTBjointCE is to estimate the joint posterior distribution of cost and time to event (diagnosis or start treatment).

## Installation

And the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("n8thangreen/DxTBjointCE")
```
